name: lentil banana muffins
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease 12 muffin cups or line with paper muffin liners.
Blend lentils, bananas, oil, and milk in a blender until smooth; pour into a bowl. Stir sugar into lentil mixture.
Whisk flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a separate bowl; fold into lentil mixture until just combined. Spoon batter into prepared muffin cups.
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 20 to 25 minutes. Cool in the pans for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack.
